channel.title: Looks like.....
channel.description: ....Operation Black Mesa has lost their site. Perhaps they have disbanded and fallen to the wayside. Too bad, would have loved to see an Opposing Force mod in addition to Black Mesa.

item.title: Looks like.....
item.dc:creator: Ixy
item.description:
Ah so.

I wasn’t even aware that a remake of Opposing Force was in the works.
Nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Looks like.....
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Ixy:

Wat
The site works fine for me.

But if it did shut down, wouldn’t that be good news?

Operation Black Mesa.

Not Black Mesa.

Read full topic

item.description:
Just check their Moddb page for now. Nothing that big, the websites been updated less than the page.

item.title: Looks like.....
item.dc:creator: sps96
item.description:
“Just in case, do not panic because our site is down. We are not dead . It’s because our hosting expired. We will make anouncement asap in regards of what’s going on with OBM right now. Stay tuned”

item.title: Looks like.....
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
The site is down, the mod is still going. Also this is not the right place to post about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Looks like.....
item.dc:creator: Ixy
item.description:
Wat
The site works fine for me.

But if it did shut down, wouldn’t that be good news?

Hubicorn:

It was said that once the soundtrack is released, one could expect the launch of black mesa two weeks after. I can now say that a new website will be launched with the soundtrack in preparation for the mod. Fuck if we care about the current website. Just take a good look at it because it will be gone soon enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Looks like.....
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Don’t really care. I’ll play it when it’s out but it does not look too promising. Most of their models look like subsurf’d versions of the originals.

Read full topic
